content.rendered:
[blank_spacer height=”65px” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”] [spb_text_block title=”Who we are” pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/3″ el_position=”first”]

CASSEL Inspection specializes in protecting valuable production machinery against damage caused by undiscovered metal parts. CASSEL also succeeds in quality control in the consumer goods industry. We strive to supply quality and high performance at a reasonable price.

Since 1994, CASSEL Inspection has led the production machinery industry in the design and construction of metal detection, checkweigher and x-ray inspection systems for industrial applications. CASSEL systems specialize in protecting valuable production machinery against damage caused by undiscovered metal parts.

[/spb_text_block] [spb_accordion widget_title=”More about us” width=”1/3″] [spb_accordion_tab title=”Technologies” accordion_id=”” icon=””] [spb_text_block pb_margin_bottom=”no” pb_border_bottom=”no” width=”1/1″ el_position=”first last”]
